summary: A small proof-of-concept mod for a Dark Souls-inspired checkpoint system.
descriptionHtml:
This is a proof-of-concept for a mod I am working on called "Checkpoints".  Instead of reloading a previous save when you die, you will instead be teleported back to the last checkpoint used.  Any items you collected will still remain in your inventory, but *all actors you've killed will be reanimated*.

In this proof-of-concept version of the mod, there are only two checkpoints, both of which are in Riverwood.  I plan to incrementally add more checkpoints to the world in the "real" version of this mod (atleast one for every dungeon and town).

This mod *does not* stop you from quicksaving / quickloading any time you want...just in case I didn't put a checkpoint where you think one should have been ;-)

The purpose behind this mod is to make the death system more like Dark Souls.  I'm open to any feedback.
author: falconfetus8
